Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary; translations
_description: A literal rendering of the Latin ‘Gaude virgo mater christi / que per aurem concepisti etc.’ — three 6-line stanzas

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Glade us maiden moder mildeþurru þin herre þu were
                    wid childe…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Be þerin us forto fondenin ioye þat is
                    endeles
CamTCC323.Note:
Latin texts precede each stanza, with the first Gaude virgo mater
                        christi / que per aurem concepisti.
CamTCC323.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 32-3.
Saupe,  Karen,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Marian
                    Lyrics.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 1998: 162-3; 274-6.
